item.title: 如何部署一个Web应用到云服务器
item.description: 常用信息 # dev安装依赖 # npm i --save-dev 数据库账户 # user:backend passwd:123456 localhost:3306 部署服务器上的数据库账户 # user:root passwd:as251421 6.

item.title: The revolution will be complete when the language is perfect
item.description: He moved over to the window # Since about that time, war had been literally continuous, though strictly speaking it had not always been the same war.

item.title: Sanity is not statistical
item.description: There was no way of knowing whose version would finally be adopted # Once again he glanced at his rival in the opposite cubicle.

item.title: It's a beautiful thing, the destruction of words
